item.title: Yogurt for Uric Acid Research
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Yogurt is linked to lower uric acid. Yet studies don't include gout sufferers. See principles you can include in your diet. Read yogurt for uric acid research.

item.title: Stevia & Uric Acid Research
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Does stevia make gout worse? Good news - it reduces uric acid. Bad news - it is not tested on human gouty arthritis. Get Stevia & Uric Acid Research facts now.

item.title: Astaxanthin and Uric Acid Research
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Many gout sufferers fear fish as a source of uric acid. Yet pink seafood appears to have a normalizing effect. Read the facts about astaxanthin and gout.

item.title: Pumpkin, Squash, and Uric Acid Research
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Gourds are a large family of vegetables. Sufferers ask if eating gourd is good or bad for gout? See latest research on pumpkin, squash, marrow, and uric acid.

item.title: Uricase Medication with Methotrexate
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Uricase medication is a fast-acting uric acid treatment. But most gout patients develop immunity to it. See how methotrexate makes pegloticase more effective.

item.title: Target Uric Acid Below 6 mg/dL
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Gout is progressive, debilitating, and dangerous. Unless uric acid is controlled. Normal uric acid can be too high. See why uric acid is only safe below 6 mg/dL.

item.title: Uric Acid Testing Smartphone
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: Are you getting a uric acid test kit? How about a meter on your mobile? Instantly share results with doctors. See the latest uric acid testing smartphone.

item.title: GoutPal Research in Progress
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: These are the gout studies, uric acid investigations, and related resources that are missing from GoutPal pages. These might be from mentions in the gout forum. Or from references in pages on my main gout site. If you want meContinue reading... GoutPal Research in Progress

item.title: Normal Range of Uric Acid in Blood
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: References ranges are vital in gout management. As they control diagnosis and treatment. Is yours calculated badly? Get your Normal Range of Uric Acid in Blood.

item.title: Gout & Uric Acid Research in Progress
item.dc:creator: Keith Taylor
item.description: These are the gout studies, uric acid investigations, and related resources that I am researching. At the moment, these are ideas for future articles that are in various stages of progress. If you want me to prioritize any articles, letContinue reading... Gout & Uric Acid Research in Progress
